artist: Painter: After Federico Zuccaro; Etcher: Giovanni Orlandi
description: an arched composition; at top Jesus taken down from cross in the arms of three angels resting on a cloud; woman at left gesturing with left hand towards cross; man seated at right with open book and pen; lion at center; all surrounded by cherubs and putti
inscription:
Signature, Date, and  Inscription

in image in black: Fredericus Zuccarius in. et./ pinxit pro Reg\'l Catholico a lescuriale   Giouanni Orlandi apparquino For. Ro. 1598 / around arch 2 lines in Latin  | on sheet in pencil: 2-638
title: Print
